conclusion: Stream A (orange) strikes the long black baffle.
Stream A is deflected toward the centre and then directed by the slanted purple baffle into the red-coloured container row.
Stream B (cyan) falls between the black and purple baffles.
Stream B rides down the purple baffle and is guided straight into the green-coloured container row immediately to its right.
Stream C (pink) drops unhindered near the right wall.
Stream C hits the cyan baffle at the bottom right and is redirected into the purple-coloured container row at the extreme left.
